nodes.text: TuskBlaster was the name of a hygienic product developed by GamorrCare. Gamorreans would use TuskBlaster to aid them in eliminating embarrassing yellow stains that would develop on their tusks. Advertisments for TuskBlaster ran in HoloNet News.

TuskBlaster was introduced in HoloNet News, a website published prior to the release of Star Wars: Episode II Attack of the Clones. Advertisements for the product ran throughout the numerous issues of HoloNet News.
